betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I am here, I am in Vethea.
I am here, in the world of endless nightmare.
I am here, truly here, just as myself, all of it, exposed.
I am here, and I do not like what I see.
I am here, naked, powerless.
I am here, I don't want to be here.
I am here, I have to be here.
I am here, and I need a way to ensure I can keep staying here!
I am here.
